means: 塞浦路斯的，塞浦路斯人[语]的

sentence.Network_en: In the'Iliad'Aphrodite is called " the Cyprian " or " Cytherea ".
sentence.Network_cn: 在《伊利亚特》诗中,阿芙罗狄蒂被称为 “ 塞浦路斯女神 ” 或是 “ 雪萨莉亚 ”.

sentence.Network_en: Cyprian, for example, talks of exhibitions of shame and modesty.
sentence.Network_cn: 例如, 希普林曾谈到羞愧跟谦逊的展示.

means.word_mean: 1. a woman who engages in sexual intercourse for money
1. resembling the ancient orgiastic worship of Aphrodite on Cyprus
